attributes.action: Reveiw the closer of social services homes in nottinghamshire ,especialy in relation to care of clients with advanced dementia in the Bassetlaw area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Social services have under tacken a county wide reveiw  of their services , as a result of which they have ear marked 15 out of 31 homes for closer,including 2 homes in Bassetlaw which provide specilist Dementia care for people in later stages of the illness,and also provide the only day care provision for people with Dementia  in the area , Socil services claim to have consulted widely however , those individuals who provide the care both professionals and other carers have not been consulted.
